ComicInfo.Summary: The Menaced Phantom (or: Deadpool's Last, We Swear, Cosmic Adventure): The Merc with a Mouth faces his hardest challenge yet-getting home from outer space! After the events of DEADPOOL #41, Wade Wilson is stranded in space with the alien known as Dirty Wolff! Will Deadpool find his way back to Earth, or will he be destroyed by the deadly interstellar space warden named Rasputin?!
ComicInfo.Title: The Menaced Phantom (or: Deadpool's Last, We Swear, Cosmic Adventure)
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
